name: Beautiful Lebanon
description:
Lebanon
is famous for its exquisite beauty, diversity, glamour, European flavor, and
hospitable people. Its rich culture and history have placed it on the “must
see” list of every traveler. Lebanon is an ancient land that has been at the
heart of the growth of two of the world’s major religions, Christianity and Islam.
Lebanon's history has helped to create a dynamic cultural and historical
scenery which comes to light on this tour. It's a chauffeur-driven tour  so you will be able to personalize it and
stop anywhere for good pictures. As a very good option, we are going to stop at
a one of the greatest holy places in the country with fantastic views on
Jounieh Bay in ancient archaeological site in Byblos Castel and discover the
beautiful natural wonder of Jeita Grotto with a boat trip on a lake to discover
lower cave. In addition, we can have a traditional Lebanese lunch of meze in a
distinctive restaurant in Byblos.
